text: Hello everyone. I'm Ishit, a sophomore at IIT Kanpur. I have just started using Julia, and am hoping to contribute to this wonderful community. I am aiming at this years GSOC and JSOC and am interested in Linear algebra and DE's a lot . Hoping to contribute in these domains and developing a strong bonding with this community :grin:.
